statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT feedback, suggestion FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE date_submitted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 456 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 789 AND suggestion IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM EmployeeFeedback;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT feedback_id, employee_id, suggestion FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE date_submitted BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM EmployeeFeedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT employee_id, MAX(date_submitted) AS latest_submission FROM EmployeeFeedback GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM feedback
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT * FROM suggestions WHERE suggestion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY suggestion_date ASC
SELECT suggestion_text FROM suggestions WHERE employee_id = 200
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT suggestion_text, suggestion_date FROM suggestions WHERE employee_id = 2
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM suggestions JOIN feedback ON suggestions.employee_id = feedback.employee_id
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM EmployeeFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM EmployeeFeedback GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT * FROM ContinuousImprovement WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT recognition_type, message FROM EmployeeRecognition WHERE recognition_type = 'Appreciation'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT recognition_type, message FROM EmployeeRecognition WHERE employee_id = 200 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ContinuousImprovement WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, initiative_name FROM ContinuousImprovement WHERE description LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, employee_id FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_category WHERE category_name = 'Performance';
SELECT employee_id, suggestion_text FROM suggestion WHERE submitted_at >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recognition_program WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT suggestion_text FROM suggestion WHERE program_id = 1 AND suggestion_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recognition_program WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND program_id = 3;
SELECT category_name FROM feedback_category WHERE category_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY submitted_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM recognition_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_ratings WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT suggestion_id, suggestion_text, submitted_by FROM employee_suggestions WHERE submitted_by = 101;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM recognition_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_ratings;
SELECT suggestion_id, suggestion_text, submitted_by FROM employee_suggestions WHERE submitted_by = 201 ORDER BY suggestion_id DESC;
